advanced-nft-types.title: Advanced NFT Types
advanced-nft-types.summary: Specialized NFT contracts: soulbound tokens (ERC-5192), dynamic NFTs, insurance, dispute resolution (Kleros), token-bound accounts (ERC-6551), staking, composable NFTs (ERC-998), social recovery, phys

api-backend.title: API Backend
api-backend.summary: Express/Node.js API backend for NFT protocol: REST endpoints, webhook handlers, indexing services, and database models.

cicd-pipeline.title: CI/CD Pipeline
cicd-pipeline.summary: Continuous integration and deployment pipeline for NFT protocol: GitHub Actions workflows, automated testing, deployment scripts, and monitoring.

core-contracts.title: Core Contracts
core-contracts.summary: Foundational smart contracts: ERC-721 (upgradeable, RBAC, pausable, royalties) and UUPS proxy setup.

module-1-module-1-secure-erc-721-upgrade.title: MODULE 1: SECURE ERC-721 (UPGRADEABLE + RBAC + PAUSE + ROYALTIES)

module-1b-institutional-nft-compliance-l.title: MODULE 1B: INSTITUTIONAL NFT (COMPLIANCE + LIFECYCLE + UPGRADEABLE)
module-1b-institutional-nft-compliance-l.summary: The primary institutional-grade NFT contract used across all tests, deployments, and integrations. Extends ERC721SecureUUPS with compliance whitelist, token lifecycle states, and per-token royalties.

module-2-module-2-upgradeable-proxy-setu.title: MODULE 2: UPGRADEABLE PROXY SETUP (HARDHAT + OZ UPGRADES)

defi-finance.title: DeFi & Finance
defi-finance.summary: NFT financialization: fractionalization vaults, lending/borrowing, rental protocols, royalty routing, streaming payments, AMM pools, floor price oracles, and peer-to-pool lending.

module-3-module-3-fractionalization-vaul.title: MODULE 3: FRACTIONALIZATION VAULT (NFT -> ERC20 FRACTIONS + BUYOUT)

module-46-module-46-nft-loans-with-strea.title: MODULE 46: NFT LOANS WITH STREAMING PAYMENTS

foundry-testing-formal-verification.title: Foundry Testing & Formal Verification
foundry-testing-formal-verification.summary: Modern Solidity testing with Foundry (forge), invariant testing, fuzz testing, deployment scripts, gas benchmarks, and formal verification with Certora/Halmos.

initialize-foundry-project-alongside-har.title: Initialize Foundry project alongside Hardhat
initialize-foundry-project-alongside-har.summary: forge init --no-commit forge install OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable forge install OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts forge install foundry-rs/forge-std

frontend-integration.title: Frontend Integration
frontend-integration.summary: React hooks, Web3 integration patterns, and reusable frontend components for NFT applications.

gaming-nfts.title: Gaming NFTs
gaming-nfts.summary: Game-oriented NFT contracts: achievement badge systems and RPG-style loot/equipment systems.

governance-compliance-legal.title: Governance, Compliance & Legal
governance-compliance-legal.summary: DAO governance, compliance registry (KYC/AML/whitelist), ZK compliance proofs, and legal templates for RWA tokenization.

module-4-module-4-dao-voting-contract-to.title: MODULE 4: DAO VOTING CONTRACT (TOKEN + GOVERNOR + TIMELOCK)
module-4-module-4-dao-voting-contract-to.summary: The canonical, safe baseline: - **GovToken** = ERC20Votes (delegation & snapshots) - **GovTimelock** = TimelockController (queued execution) - **GovGovernor** = Governor + quorum + settings + timelock

clone-and-install.title: Clone and install
clone-and-install.summary: git clone <repo> cd institutional-nft-protocol npm install

article-2-asset-description.title: Article 2: Asset Description
article-2-asset-description.summary: 2.1 **Asset**: [Detailed description of the underlying asset] - Type: [Real Estate / Art / Securities / Other] - Location: [Physical location if applicable] - Valuation: $[Amount] as of [Date] - Appra

article-4-governance.title: Article 4: Governance
article-4-governance.summary: 4.1 **Major Decisions**: Require [X]% token holder approval: - Sale of underlying asset - Material modifications to asset - Change of custodian - Dissolution of SPV

article-5-distributions.title: Article 5: Distributions
article-5-distributions.summary: 5.1 **Revenue Distribution**: Net proceeds distributed quarterly via: - Smart contract: [RoyaltyRouter address] - Pro-rata based on token holdings at snapshot date

article-6-transfer-restrictions.title: Article 6: Transfer Restrictions
article-6-transfer-restrictions.summary: 6.1 **KYC/AML**: All token holders must complete KYC verification

article-7-redemption.title: Article 7: Redemption
article-7-redemption.summary: 7.1 **Redemption Events**: - Sale of underlying asset - Dissolution of SPV - Token holder buyout (if enabled)

article-8-dissolution.title: Article 8: Dissolution
article-8-dissolution.summary: 8.1 **Triggers**: - Sale of asset - [X]% token holder vote - Regulatory requirement

nft-token-holder-agreement.title: NFT TOKEN HOLDER AGREEMENT
nft-token-holder-agreement.summary: By acquiring, holding, or transferring the NFT tokens described herein, the holder ("Token Holder") agrees to the following terms:

1-nature-of-token.title: 1. Nature of Token
1-nature-of-token.summary: 1.1 The NFT token represents a beneficial ownership interest in the underlying asset held by [SPV Name] LLC (the "SPV").

2-compliance-obligations.title: 2. Compliance Obligations
2-compliance-obligations.summary: 2.1 Token Holder represents and warrants: - Completed KYC/AML verification - Not a resident of restricted jurisdictions - [If applicable] Qualifies as accredited investor - Will maintain compliance th

3-rights-and-obligations.title: 3. Rights and Obligations
3-rights-and-obligations.summary: 3.1 Token Holder is entitled to: - Pro-rata share of distributions - Voting rights on major decisions - Access to asset documentation - Redemption upon qualifying events

4-risks.title: 4. Risks
4-risks.summary: Token Holder acknowledges the following risks: - Asset value may decrease - Smart contract may have vulnerabilities - Regulatory environment may change - Liquidity may be limited - Redemption may be d

5-limitation-of-liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
5-limitation-of-liability.summary: The SPV, its managers, and service providers shall not be liable for: - Market value fluctuations - Smart contract failures (unless negligent) - Force majeure events - Third-party actions

7-acceptance.title: 7. Acceptance
7-acceptance.summary: By interacting with the token smart contract, Token Holder confirms: - Reading and understanding this agreement - Meeting all eligibility requirements - Accepting all terms and conditions

infrastructure-cross-chain.title: Infrastructure & Cross-Chain
infrastructure-cross-chain.summary: Oracle integration (Chainlink), The Graph subgraph indexing, multi-chain deployment, cross-chain bridging (LayerZero), account abstraction (ERC-4337), analytics dashboards, MEV protection, and Permit2

nft-entity.title: NFT Entity
nft-entity.summary: type Token @entity { id: ID!                          # contract-tokenId contract: Bytes! tokenId: BigInt! owner: User! creator: User tokenURI: String metadata: TokenMetadata mintedAt: BigInt! mintTxH

user-entity.title: User Entity
user-entity.summary: type User @entity { id: ID!                          # wallet address address: Bytes! tokensOwned: [Token!]! @derivedFrom(field: "owner") tokensCreated: [Token!]! @derivedFrom(field: "creator") purcha

transfer-history.title: Transfer History
transfer-history.summary: type Transfer @entity { id: ID! token: Token! from: User! to: User! timestamp: BigInt! blockNumber: BigInt! txHash: Bytes! }

marketplace-entities.title: Marketplace Entities
marketplace-entities.summary: type Listing @entity { id: ID! token: Token! seller: User! price: BigInt! createdAt: BigInt! expiresAt: BigInt! isActive: Boolean! sale: Sale }

lending-entities.title: Lending Entities
lending-entities.summary: type Loan @entity { id: ID! token: Token! borrower: User! lender: User! principal: BigInt! interestRateBps: BigInt! accruedInterest: BigInt! startTime: BigInt! duration: BigInt!

rental-entities.title: Rental Entities
rental-entities.summary: type Rental @entity { id: ID! token: Token! owner: User! renter: User! pricePerDay: BigInt! totalPaid: BigInt! startTime: BigInt! endTime: BigInt! isActive: Boolean!

fractionalization-entities.title: Fractionalization Entities
fractionalization-entities.summary: type FractionalVault @entity { id: ID! token: Token! curator: User! fractionToken: Bytes! totalFractions: BigInt! buyoutPrice: BigInt buyoutActive: Boolean! soldAt: BigInt soldTo: User

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.summary: type DailyStats @entity { id: ID!                          # date string date: BigInt! totalVolume: BigInt! salesCount: BigInt! uniqueBuyers: BigInt! uniqueSellers: BigInt! avgPrice: BigInt! floorPric

get-all-tokens-owned-by-a-user.title: Get all tokens owned by a user
get-all-tokens-owned-by-a-user.summary: query GetUserTokens($owner: String!) { tokens(where: { owner: $owner }) { id tokenId tokenURI state mintedAt } }

get-active-listings.title: Get active listings
get-active-listings.summary: query GetActiveListings($first: Int!, $skip: Int!) { listings( where: { isActive: true } orderBy: createdAt orderDirection: desc first: $first skip: $skip ) { id token {

get-recent-sales.title: Get recent sales
get-recent-sales.summary: query GetRecentSales($first: Int!) { sales(orderBy: timestamp, orderDirection: desc, first: $first) { id token { tokenId } seller { address } buyer {

get-collection-stats.title: Get collection stats
get-collection-stats.summary: query GetCollectionStats($contract: Bytes!) { collectionStats(id: $contract) { totalSupply totalVolume totalSales floorPrice avgPrice uniqueOwners } }

get-user-activity.title: Get user activity
get-user-activity.summary: query GetUserActivity($user: String!) { user(id: $user) { tokensOwned { tokenId } purchases(orderBy: timestamp, orderDirection: desc, first: 10) { price timestamp } sales(orderBy: timestamp, orderDire

get-daily-stats-for-charts.title: Get daily stats for charts
get-daily-stats-for-charts.summary: query GetDailyStats($days: Int!) { dailyStats(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: $days) { date totalVolume salesCount avgPrice } }

deploy-to-all-testnets.title: Deploy to all testnets
deploy-to-all-testnets.summary: echo "Deploying to testnets..." npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_multichain.ts --network sepolia npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_multichain.ts --network polygonMumbai npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_multi

marketplace-trading.title: Marketplace & Trading
marketplace-trading.summary: NFT marketplace contracts: buy/sell/auction, collection offers, trait-based offers, options/futures, and operator filter registry.

media-art-nfts.title: Media & Art NFTs
media-art-nfts.summary: Specialized media NFT contracts: music NFTs with streaming royalties, video NFTs with monetization, generative art engine with on-chain seeds, and fully on-chain SVG art.

minting-strategies.title: Minting Strategies
minting-strategies.summary: Advanced minting patterns: lazy minting, Merkle allowlists, gasless transactions (ERC-2771), commit-reveal anti-bot, Dutch auctions, and VRF raffle minting.

modern-standards-cross-chain.title: Modern Standards & Cross-Chain
modern-standards-cross-chain.summary: Newer ERC standards (ERC-7572, ERC-7510, ERC-6900/7579), Chainlink CCIP cross-chain messaging, and modular smart account integration.

module-chainlink-ccip-cross-chain-intero.title: MODULE: CHAINLINK CCIP (CROSS-CHAIN INTEROPERABILITY)
module-chainlink-ccip-cross-chain-intero.summary: Chainlink Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol for bridging NFTs and messages across chains. Alternative/complement to LayerZero.

module-erc-7572-contract-level-metadata.title: MODULE: ERC-7572 (CONTRACT-LEVEL METADATA)
module-erc-7572-contract-level-metadata.summary: Standard for contract-level metadata, enabling rich descriptions, logos, and social links for NFT collections.

module-erc-7510-cross-contract-nft-refer.title: MODULE: ERC-7510 (CROSS-CONTRACT NFT REFERENCE)
module-erc-7510-cross-contract-nft-refer.summary: Enables NFTs to reference other NFTs across contracts, creating parent-child relationships.

module-erc-6900-erc-7579-modular-smart-a.title: MODULE: ERC-6900 / ERC-7579 (MODULAR SMART ACCOUNTS)
module-erc-6900-erc-7579-modular-smart-a.summary: Modular account abstraction extending ERC-4337 with plugin architecture.

erc-7579-modular-account-with-nft-module.title: ERC-7579 Modular Account with NFT Module

module-erc-7628-nft-metadata-json-schema.title: MODULE: ERC-7628 (NFT METADATA JSON SCHEMA VALIDATION)
module-erc-7628-nft-metadata-json-schema.summary: On-chain validation of NFT metadata structure.

standards-quick-reference.title: Standards Quick Reference
standards-quick-reference.summary: | Standard | Purpose | Status | |----------|---------|--------| | ERC-721 | Unique NFTs | Final | | ERC-1155 | Multi-token | Final | | ERC-2981 | Royalties | Final | | ERC-4337 | Account Abstraction |

operations-incident-response-monitoring.title: Operations, Incident Response & Monitoring
operations-incident-response-monitoring.summary: Production operations runbook: incident response playbook, monitoring setup, upgrade governance flow, and disaster recovery procedures.

fortaconfigyml.title: forta.config.yml
fortaconfigyml.summary: alertConfig: - name: "Pause Event" description: "Contract was paused" severity: "CRITICAL" conditions: - event: "Paused(address)" contract: "${NFT_CONTRACT}"

sdk-configuration-tooling.title: SDK, Configuration & Tooling
sdk-configuration-tooling.summary: SDK package, batch operations (Multicall), contract ABIs, event signatures, environment templates, Hardhat configuration, and internationalized error messages.

copy-this-file-to-env-and-fill-in-your-v.title: Copy this file to .env and fill in your values

rpc-urls-get-from-alchemy-infura-or-quic.title: RPC URLs (get from Alchemy, Infura, or QuickNode)

alchemy-api-key-for-webhooks-nft-api-etc.title: Alchemy API Key (for webhooks, NFT API, etc.)

use-a-dedicated-deployment-wallet-not-yo.title: Use a dedicated deployment wallet, not your main wallet

mainnet-contracts.title: Mainnet Contracts
mainnet-contracts.summary: NFT_CONTRACT_MAINNET=0x... MARKETPLACE_CONTRACT_MAINNET=0x... LENDING_CONTRACT_MAINNET=0x... FRACTIONAL_CONTRACT_MAINNET=0x... GOVERNANCE_CONTRACT_MAINNET=0x... COMPLIANCE_CONTRACT_MAINNET=0x...

security-testing.title: Security & Testing
security-testing.summary: Security audit checklist and comprehensive test suite for NFT protocol contracts.

social-attestation.title: Social & Attestation
social-attestation.summary: Ethereum Attestation Service (EAS) integration and on-chain curation/gallery system with curator profiles, exhibitions, and tipping.

erc-standards-extensions.title: ERC Standards Extensions
erc-standards-extensions.summary: Additional ERC standard implementations: ERC-5643 (subscription extension) and EIP-5169 (script URI for client-side execution).
